tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Wish I could just explain my experience with stars. I think I love everything about her. My previous doctor had put me down and I changed to her in my 9th month. I am so grateful I chose her. She took care of me how exactly I thought a doctor should be. Her love for her work and patients is so evident in the way she treats them. I am lucky that I chose her and my daughter had seen her first. She will always hold a  special place in my heart not only becoz she helped me delivered my baby but the way she took care of me after delivery. Even when my C-section scar opened up due to my negligence after six months, she told me nothing to worry. She gives me this amazing confidence and I am so glad that I can’t thank her enough.

tags: None
review:
Whenever we think for a doctor we think whether that doctor will be contactable at the time of emergency or not.?
I would like to tell all people reading this that Dr chaya patil is the doctor which will be just a call away or msg in case of emergency n always ready to help. 
She is very sweet n listen to all problems n give **** cure n medicine.. She cares for her every patient n pray for their well n speedy recovery too.. I would strongly recommend Dr Chaya Patil for any gynec or pregnancy related issues..

tags: None
review:
The waiting area is clean and well maintained but is always very crowded. Thankfully I had booked an appointment directly. It started well in time. Initially I was a bit confused and tensed, but the Dr Chaya made me really comfortable. She talked with me throughout the procedure with a smiling face. There was no hurry for other patients. She focused on what is beneficial for me and clearly explained the precautions and side effects for the medicine and procedures prescribed.

She prescribe less medicine for any treatment, my wife got normal delivery baby on feb 2016

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I strongly recommend Dr. Chaya Patil. She is extremely talented and explains things very well. My entire pregnancy journey was so smooth under the guidance of Chaya ma’am . I went through all the tests and scans advised by her and everything went very well and I delivered a healthy baby boy on March 28th. I am very grateful to Dr. Chaya Patil. Words will fall short to describe how good she is. 

Also I recommend Nest at Fortis hospital, Bannerghatta Road because the entire process was so good. All nurses and hospital staffs are so helpful. 

Lastly a big thank you to Chaya maam and Fortis hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted her for general check-up. *** *** ** *** *** ***** *** *** *** **** **** * ****** ******** she hardly took interest even though I come from a family with uterine and breast cancer. She asked me why I was doing the check-up at such young age. I was looking for advice on gynae health and safe practices but didn't get any. When the speculum she used was seriously hurting me, she blamed it on me being "uncooperative", rather than investigating what was causing the pain which even led to bleeding.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We consulted Dr. Chaya Patil at Fortis, Bannerghatta Road till 7th month of pregnancy and I must say that I am fully satisfied with the doctor. She’s extremely patient in listening, gives appropriate advice, doesn’t advise unnecessary tests or medications and explains everything in detail. 
I had to travel to my hometown for delivery in 7th month of pregnancy. I had some problem after child birth in my hometown and called the doctor over phone after almost 3 months but still doctor had the courtesy to answer all my questions over phone; she spoke to my husband for almost 5 mins and gave suggestions regarding my problem. 
I highly recommend the doctor!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: After a lot of online research and based on experience from few friends we thought of consulting Dr.Chaya Patil. And with few beginning consultations Dr.Chaya Patil has met with our expectations, as she is having 20 +years of experience, very kind, polite and have great patience to hear our issues. Throughout our experience Dr.Chaya Patil was very caring especially at labor room and post delivery. Baby had passed meconium but she was patient and waited for the normal delivery to happen. Really grateful to ma'am who patiently waited and encouraged for normal delivery. She Never prescribed any unnecessary medicines or unnecessary scans and tests . Our family is really thankful to Dr .Chaya Patil .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Patil is a very *************..caring...and a humble doctor...The best part of Dr Patil is that she always wears a smile whenevr at whatevr time you visit her..I was consulting her during my second issue..and the entire period of my pregnancy went well without any trouble under her guidance.She is a doctor who always answered my queries be it even a minor one with patience and a smile on her face...she always responded to my messages and gave solutions even at odd hours...a big thanks to you Doctor

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Excellent and outstanding. She is the I ly doctor I can vouch for normal delivery.she is very sweet and throughout 9 Months of my pregnancy, she had lots of patience of listen to me and entertained all my tantrums :) ... And on the day of delivery,it was sunday and she ready had three patients for delivery (I think 2 cartoon and 1 normal delivery), she met me at 9.30pm (very tired )and said ... Looks like your delivery is for tomorrow.. I'll meet you,and left... And unfortunately we had to call her at 11pm.she just came back by 11.30)pm and stayed till 3am with me.. inspite of my requesting for cartoon,she opted for normal delivery and I am glad with her decision :) ... Selfless doctor always available for her patients and also answer all queries.

tags: None
review: She is my favourite, in case she is not available i ll visit to other doctor but surely come back to show the doctor report to her. Doctor ** **** ************** *** explains everything properly. She will not give unnecessary medicines as well as tests to do. I got my first kid under her medication by normal delivery. She focus on normal rather than C-section. As other doctors medicine prescribed  will be only available in their pharmacy or next pharmacy stores her prescribed medicines will be available in all the medicine store due to this we wont find any issue. She cures problem with solutions from root level.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: She is a great doctor who is very polite and with down to earth nature. You don't need to hesitate to discuss any kind of problem with her. She gives very good tips and doesn't suggest over medication. It's a pleasure to talk to Dr.  Chaya Patil. My first child was delivered by her and she is a miracle to us. Now consulting for the second issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Extremely  grateful to dr madam

My daughter delivered 2 months premature baby with an emergency cesarean..it was done by dr chaya madam

She came at night 10 pm immediately  and performed
Now my granddaughter  is doing well 

EXTREMELY  GRATEFUL  TO SUCH A DEDICATED DOCTOR

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ***** ***** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ************* **** *** *** * ******** ********** She is very friendly and explains and listens to our queries patiently. ******* ********* *** *********** ****************** You can completely trust her. Thank you so much Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Mam made me very comfortable and explained everything about syptomsbefore i could say anything. My other doctor suggested a laproscopy but mam gave a easy solution without operation. I thank her for that becoz I'm very afraid of operations. I loved the way she took initiative to explain why I'm getting this problem thanq so much mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ***** *** ***** Delivered my first baby on 16-december-2018. She was extremely good, doesn't prescribe tests and scans or tables unnecessarily. Her experience and exposure is vast. My baby had turned head down bit not fixed it's head. I was so concerned. She doesn't panic or scare. She waited, she didn't induce and i had a normal and very peaceful delivery. I and baby are doing great and happy.. My sister in law and other friends are consulted her as well. Five stars, hands down.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I have been consulting Dr. Chaya since long. She is a very experienced, wonderful person, warm, knowledgeable and extremely approachable. She listens to Ur concerns in detail, dosnt jump to conclusions or treatments, studies the patient well before suggesting the treatment. She doesn't advice on heavy medications or checks unless it's really required.

tags: None
review: Dr Chaya delivered our 1st baby, and we had a very good experience throughout—from day 1 of our prenatal visit till the post-delivery phases. She was reachable on phone whenever there was an emergency. Her humble and down-to-earth nature, and the zeal to understand her patient is really commendable. We are now expecting are second child, and we never thought of going to a different doctor as we know we are in safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: If you are looking for a reliable gynecologist your search ends here.  I have started visiting her from 4th month of my pregnancy. She is very trustworthy, friendly, explains everything in detail, does not prescribe unnecessary medicines. Mine was twin pregnancy which is considered to be high risk pregnancy but she has never made me feel like that  and so it went very smoothly under her guidance. She and her team performed my C section delivery very well. I am blessed with a baby boy and and a baby girl and both are healthy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Doctor Chaya Patil for my pregnancy. I was a very satisfactory experience with her. She was very patient with me through out my pregnancy journey. She answered all my queries patiently and helped ease my anxiety as it was my first pregnancy. On the day of my delivery I was induced for labour. She left for home as my delivery was not expected that day. But once she came to know that I was about to give birth, she came back to hospital in no time. She did my delivery and was very encouraging through out the process. I had a normal, natural and healthy delivery just because of her. I will definately recommend doctor Chaya Patil to all the expecting mothers.

tags: None
review: She is one of the Best we had encountered. Always calm quiet and ready to assist. We were blessed with a cute Angel. Still remember that my wife used to have a list of questions for her everytime there was a visit. She always used to answer all of them. Thank you Doctor....

tags: None
review: Dr. Chayapatll has been my gynecologist from past 11 years. She is very persistent and a well experienced consultant. She prescribes good medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very Courteous and good listener. Very Humble. Very much experienced. Highly recommended Doctor for Gyenocology...

tags: None

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very good and friendly nature of doctor. She is so patience to listen our things and explain neatly with medications and what needs to be done and what not to. She make us feel comfortable with her in the conversations. So worthy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I went to the Doctor for pre- pregnancy planning and guidance, but she shrugged off saying I have no issues and hence I should visit her only if I have any issue. I was not suggested any pre- conception tests or check- ups. 
No consultation was given by her for pregnancy. She did not even ask for my details. Directly started with what problem I have and since I had no issues, I was out of her room in 3 mins. The entire reason of visiting her went into vain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Chaya Patil is an excellent health care provider. I consulted her through my pregnancy. she does not prescribe unnecessary medication. she is very experienced, professional, patient and friendly. I delivered my baby naturally and she was of great support in the process.  she encouraged and motivated me when I had given up.  *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ******* ********* *** I highly recommend her.

tags: None
review: I met Dr. Patil regarding a gynecological issue. I was prescribed the right medication which helped resolve my issue. She is a very experienced doctor, but like most other doctors working in large hospitals, she lacked the patience to listen to the issue completely. I still prefer visiting clinics than going to large hospitals for this reason specifically.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Chaya mam’s attitude towards her patient is so nice that half of the time you feel confident meeting with her only.she guided us so well my pregnancy was a blessing with her. I delivered a princess in March .
Thank you Mam for all the love and support

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Extremely kind,  caring,  gentle and capable doctor who listens to the issue patiently and doesn't rush the consultation.. I was referred from other hospital to Manipal due to complications with delivery. She and her team were there on time and attended to my case and did safe C section delivery... really grateful to her...
